DOC.detailed_description: LBMI-001 multi-center , prospective , longitudinal , non-randomized study whose purpose determine whether LAP-BAND system safe effective subject BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 < 40 kg/m2 . Primary secondary outcome measure analyze 1 year post LAP-BAND implantation . Subjects continue follow 5 year post-implantation , 5 year data evaluate Post-Hoc outcome measure .
DOC.criteria: Have BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 < 35 kg/m2 ( without comorbid condition ) BMI ≥ 35 kg/m2 < 40 kg/m2 without severe comorbid condition Have history obesity least 2 year fail conservative weightreduction alternative , supervise diet , exercise behavior modification program Subject history congenital acquire anomaly gastrointestinal tract Severe cardiopulmonary serious uncontrolled organic disease Severe coagulopathy ; hepatic insufficiency cirrhosis History bariatric ; gastric ; esophageal surgery History intestinal obstruction adhesive peritonitis History esophageal dysmotility disorder Type I diabetes
